## Matrix4.inverse() method

Computes the inverse of the provided matrix using Cramers Rule. If the determinant is zero, the matrix can not be inverted, and an exception is thrown.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static inverse(matrix: Matrix4, result?: Matrix4): Matrix4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  matrix | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | The matrix to invert. |
|  result | [Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md) | _(Optional)_ The object onto which to store the result. |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4](./toygl.matrix4.md)

The modified result parameter.

## Exceptions

Error matrix is not invertible because its determinate is zero.
